mapper.sql: id, white_ip, login_no, remark, fixed_status, valid_status, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_white_ip
id,
white_ip,
login_no,
remark,
fixed_status,
valid_status,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{whiteIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{loginNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fixedStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{validStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update sys_white_ip
white_ip = #{whiteIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_no = #{loginNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fixed_status = #{fixedStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
valid_status = #{validStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select GROUP_CONCAT(white_ip separator ',') from sys_white_ip
valid_status = '1' and fixed_status = '1' and (FIND_IN_SET(#{loginNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},login_no) or login_no is NULL or login_no = '')
